g.text: Type | Speed | Density | Power | Cost | Volatility | Application
SRAM | Fast | Low | High | High | Volatile | Cache
DRAM | Medium | High | Med | Low | Volatile | Main Memory
ROM | Fast | High | Low | Low | Non-Vol | Firmware
PROM | Fast | High | Low | Med | Non-Vol | Custom Code
EPROM | Fast | High | Low | High | Non-Vol | Development
EEPROM | Medium | Med | Low | High | Non-Vol | Config Data
Flash | Medium | High | Low | Med | Non-Vol | Storage
Memory hierarchy balances speed, capacity, and cost
Fast access but requires continuous power
Retains data but typically slower access
Speed vs Density vs Power vs Cost considerations
